name: The Sims 4: First Fits Kit
storyline:
Dressed to Express — A lifetime of fashion choices starts when you become a big kid and can dress yourself. Give child Sims more ways to express themselves with the kinds of leopard-print jackets, patterned leggings, and colorful shades they’ll want to wear when they grow up.

Fashion Is 24/7 — Dress child Sims in trendy looks that are fit for birthday parties, the classroom, or just hanging out with friends. These casual looks don’t require a special occasion, but they won’t be out of place at one either.
summary: Dress the next generation of trendsetters in fashion fit for a playdate with The Sims 4 First Fits Kit. Whether a child Sim wants to turn heads on the first day of school or run around having fun with friends, these versatile styles will keep them looking fashionable (and SO cute).
